name: FlyOver
description:
Fly through your Figma or FigJam file with smooth animations, helpful for presentations and bookmarking views


Features

  • Easily add, update, sort and remove views
  • Double click to rename
  • Click on your views to animate to the corresponding location and zoom level
  • Navigate using the arrow buttons or keyboard keys
  • Toggle between regular and compact mode


Demo
